resources.string: Immersed Statusbar for Miui6\nAuthor: kqstone (kqstone@163.com)\nAcknowledgment: Great thanks to MohammadAG (https://github.com/MohammadAG/Xposed-Tinted-Status-Bar) for lots of sources.
Force tint statusbar for app without single or gradual uppart
Tint Notification Icons to adapt darkmode, need restart system.
Fast the statusbar content animation when darkmode change
Acknowledgment: Great thanks to MohammadAG (https://github.com/MohammadAG/Xposed-Tinted-Status-Bar) for lots of sources.
